name: ZenBox (anstabo)
description:
Chill, Zen and Free diorama of procedural bonzaï-building, take your time building your bonzaïs or try and complete the whishing well quest.

This game is about observing an environmental change, you can help guide it by choosing which buds to hatch. You can use this technique to break twigs and gift them to the wishing well.

You will be able to seed new bonzaïs and transform the landscape by harvesting their flowers.

Have fun designing your own bonzaï from a single seed:

The wishing well will reward you with cosmetic items and a final secret:

Keyboard:

Use WASD/ZQSD for camera movement

Mouse:

press right click to spin the camera 

Left click to interact and to grab objects

If your game crashes it means that you've won! You can reload from the game if you're stuck

64 bits-only and a pc that's at least 6 years old

HAVE FUN!
